page.title: 11BATLERS GREEN SHOPS
page.content: At Batlers green the people who own the shops are very helpful and friendly. There is a clothes shop which also sells wool, buttons, cotton and other haberdashiery; a butcher; a hardware shop which sells china, batteries, household and garden implements; a Post Office and a supermarket. My mother does most of her shopping in Radlett but my Granny finds the shops very useful because they are so close. There are flats above the shops for their owners, but other people live there as well. For them the advantage of convenient shopping is balanced by the disadvantage of having to be quiet during shop hours.
